snippet: After their loss, the Rangers have three more games to get the single point they need to clinch the No. 1 seed.
abstract: Boston Bruins defeat New York Rangers, 2-1, in the NHL.
lead_paragraph: After their loss, the Rangers have three more games to get the single point they need to clinch the No. 1 seed.

headline.seo: Bruins Keep Rangers From Clinching Eastern Conference
headline.main: Bruins Prevent Rangers From Clinching Conference and Top Seeding
headline.print_headline: Bruins Prevent Rangers From Clinching Conference and Top Seeding
